TopicTitle: Getting a Kerbal Mesh WITH Suit

Articles.Content:
Hi, I need a kerbal in a spacesuit,from stock if possible but i can't access the gamefiles.

i've been looking all over the forums and web and the only thing i found was a kerbal without suit and uv layout.

I've seen some suit textures for the texturereplacermod,so there must be a way to access the files or finding the desired meshes somewhere.

I would be grateful for any help.
There is (with a plugin) but it's probably against the EULA to just tear out the model and post it online. You could model your own or have a plugin swap in the model for you at runtime
I meant that you can access the mesh data with a plugin. The problem is that it's probably not permissible to distribute it if you do export it to disk.
I know. but it will be much easier to make one if there's an official mesh for proportion reference.
This might help you, then (post with fbx download) (post with obj download)
